\hypertarget{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_row}{}\doxysection{Open\+XLSX\+::XLRow Class Reference}
\label{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_row}\index{OpenXLSX::XLRow@{OpenXLSX::XLRow}}


The \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_row}{XLRow}} class represent a row in an Excel spreadsheet. Using \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_row}{XLRow}} objects, various row formatting options can be set and modified.  




{\ttfamily \#include $<$XLRow.\+hpp$>$}

\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
The \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_row}{XLRow}} class represent a row in an Excel spreadsheet. Using \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_row}{XLRow}} objects, various row formatting options can be set and modified.
